data.text: @tekiwikouple Seems like it. I can’t understand how they’re allowed to bring all of this stuff on site?
@bauhausandmies So does this mean Police are literally waiting for the shit to hit the fan and these guys will just leave 🤷🏼‍♀️
@Thestace06 I’m pretty sure that they’d be bloody unimpressed.
@bauhausandmies Ask healthcare workers how they feel about this ?
@bauhausandmies Why are they in hospital? They don't trust science and doctors. Shouldn't they be rubbing themselves with crystals instead?
@bauhausandmies Send them back to the ghetto they have created…surely they can build themselves a hospital down there.
